      Returns:
      the distance between local position and the input position p2

    • closeTo

      public boolean closeTo​(LongLat p2)
      To check if the distance between the local position and the input position p2 is smaller than 0.00015 degrees
      Parameters:
      p2 - The input position with data type longLat
      Returns:
      a boolean value that whether distance between these two position is smaller than 0.00015 degrees

    • nextPosition

      public LongLat nextPosition​(int direction)
      calculate the new position of the drone if it makes a move in the direction of the input angle
      Parameters:
      direction - is the input angle of the direction of this move.
      Returns:
      the position with data type longLat after making a move by the input direction, or return error message if the input angle is not valid. Or stay the same position if the input angle is -999.

    • getLatitude

      public double getLatitude()
      Returns:
      the latitude of this longlat

      public double getLongitude()
      Returns:
      the longitude of this longlat
